parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a new uniform and try to link it into uniform slot (given uniform has to be supported by allowedUniforms list of target soldier). To check if uniform is allowed use [[isUniformAllowed]] and to force add incompatible uniform use [[forceAddUniform]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addUniform''' type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[addUniform]] "U_B_CombatUniform_mcam";
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[forceAddUniform]], [[isUniformAllowed]], [[removeUniform]], [[uniform]]
</value></part></template></root>
